data.title: Book Your Next Squarespace Design Project with Hersted & Hertz — HERSTED HERTZ
data.meta_description: Get started on your next Squarespace web design project with experts at Hersted & Hertz. Schedule a Free consultation and receive a customized proposal to meet your specific needs and goals.
data.text:
START YOUR DESIGN PROJECT

Come with a VISION - Leave with a website that finally feels like you

Now booking

now booking Summer and fall projects 2023

Reach out to us through the contact form below, and we’ll aim to be in touch within 1 business day to schedule a free discovery call.

We can’t wait to hear your vision and assist you in creating it!

HELPFUL LINKS

OFFICE HOURS

Monday through Friday

9:00am-5:00pm CEST

NAME *

YOUR EMAIL *

LINK TO YOUR WEBSITE AND/OR SOCIALS *

THE NAME OF YOUR BUSINESS

LOCATION *

We work with clients globally - so it's nice to know whether to say good morning or good evening.

WHICH SERVICES ARE YOU INTERESTED IN? *

Brand Identity

Website design

Website Templates

Template customization

SEO Strategy

VIP Day Intensive

Other..,

WHAT IS YOUR BUDGET FOR THIS PROJECT? *

TELL ME ABOUT YOUR BUSINESS *

What do you do? Why are you passionate about it? Who do you help? What are your business goals?

Thank you!

We accept payment plans. The first payment is always the deposit.

The deposit is used to save your spot in our calendar, and the final payment is due before all files and/or website ownership is handed over.

No, We design only for only squarespace.

Absolutely! Website template can help you get your business of the ground and gain you sucess but if you want to truly scale to an industry leader level custom design is the road to go.

To read more about how to work with us on custom design view our services here

Yes! - Everything is customizable.

Color, fonts, images, layout, add new pages, or delete existing ones.

I’m 101% confident in the quality of our website templates, and therefore, we offer a money-back guarantee. This is valid for 7 days after purchase or until ownership is transferred.

A single logo isn’t going to move hte needle in your business as it cannot fully represent your brand's identity. Our goal is to secure your brands success in the long run. and therefor we only offer fully strategic brand identities that will actually attract and resonate with your ideal audience. View our brand builder package hereIf your budget isn’t for a full brand identity we would suggest booking a VIP day to create a mini brand that is less comprehensive, but will still reflects your passion, vision, and mission. Read more about our VIP days here

Still have questions?
